overview: A summer evening, a recently concluded rock concert, three strays in the dark of the night: an immigrant peddler with a valid residence permit expiring, an unemployed anarchist and Leila, a firefly without light.  Their story is cut short by the senseless violence of two Nazi skins.  But friendship continues to run in a yellow van, emblem of their freedom ... beyond darkness, beyond death.
title: Cani di strada
